original_text: He shall break also the images of Bethshemesh, that is in the land of Egypt; and the houses of the gods of the Egyptians shall he burn with fire.
korean_text: 그가 또 애굽 땅 벧세메스의 석상들을 깨뜨리고 애굽 신들의 신당들을 불사르리라 하셨다 할지니라 하니라

sentences.original_text: He shall break also the images of Bethshemesh
that is in the land of Egypt
and the houses of the gods of the Egyptians
